function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate social infrastructure and facilities such as health centers, nurseries, and kindergartens","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited adoption of it-driven technologies in facility management domain","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of engagement and interaction between design professionals, communities, and stakeholders in implementing regenerative practices","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased risk of infectious disease transmission in built environments due to changes in living style and architecture.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Droplet transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to prioritize team safety","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding about the correlation between wastewater-based analysis and acute infection cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Planned vacation behavior may be influenced by anxiety factors","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bad use of air-conditioning","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient emphasis on protection from small, virus-laden, airborne droplets by international health organizations like the who, rehva, and ashrae.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use of personal protective equipment ppe leading to increased transmission of covid-19 in meatpacking plants.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Climate dependency of natural ventilation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"No significant difference in health outcomes between gardening and non-gardening groups","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Emotional disturbance","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virus hotspots in urban slums and refugee camps","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations of available data pose challenges to the analysis.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Zoonotic transmission from live wild animal trade market","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for pandemic-resilient design elements in residential buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness for future events","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Expectations for vaccine","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of gender and number of children on access to green areas","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of effective workplace regulations and measures","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Localised manufacturing impacting capacity for medical products","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy risks and security breaches from iot devices and data collection","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Visiting urban parks and green spaces may lead to the propagation of contagious risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Harmful to humans","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited comparison of hvac consumption across years","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Microbial pollution from botanical filters","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urban soundscape linked to covid-19","category":"Public to central meeting rooms may result in poor indoor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High exposure risks in risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to fresh produce may lead to a higher consumption of processed, high-sodium, and less-nutritious foods with negative health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Biases in representation","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Involuntary exposure of room occupants to airborne pathogens from occupants of
